Content.Text:
<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
That feels good, doesn't it? I love this
place. But in recent years I've found
myself getting lost more easily.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
I always come here using the <RED>mini-map</RED>.

<FACE_HANA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, I know.
<PAGE>
I'll <RED>explain the mini-map</RED> to you,
<MYNAME>, if you like. You'll be able to
get anywhere in town then!
